long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simply extension allows you to quickly create new files for Microsoft Office 365 that will be stored in OneDrive, including Word, Excel and PowerPoint files. It also allows you to start a brand new Microsoft Teams meeting straight from the extension.

Credits: This plugin was inspired by the Google Docs Quick Create and Quick Create Plus extensions, which I was a long-time user of before switching to a Microsoft-based company.
